languages.text: "Вера — это просто оковы послушания. Она хороша, чтобы управлять стоящими ниже, но не мной".
"Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."
languages.original_text: "Вера — это просто оковы послушания. Она хороша, чтобы управлять стоящими ниже, но не мной".

traits.locale_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It's good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."
"Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It's good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."
"Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."
"Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."
"Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

languages.text: “信仰不过是服从的枷锁罢了。它可以帮助我控制我的臣民，但我不会受它控制。”
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: “信仰不过是服从的枷锁罢了。它可以帮助我控制我的臣民，但我不会受它控制。”

languages.text: «La fe está formada por los grilletes de la obediencia. Aunque baste para controlar a mis subordinados, a mí no me controla».
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: «La fe está formada por los grilletes de la obediencia. Aunque baste para controlar a mis subordinados, a mí no me controla».

languages.text: 「信仰は服従の足かせにすぎない。部下をコントロールするには良いが、{mf|俺|私}をコントロールするには不十分だ」
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰は服従の足かせにすぎない。部下をコントロールするには良いが、{mf|俺|私}をコントロールするには不十分だ」

languages.text: "Der Glaube ist nur die Fessel des Gehorsams. Er ist gut, um meine Untergebenen zu kontrollieren, aber nicht gut genug, um mich zu kontrollieren."
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: "Der Glaube ist nur die Fessel des Gehorsams. Er ist gut, um meine Untergebenen zu kontrollieren, aber nicht gut genug, um mich zu kontrollieren."

languages.text: « La foi n'est rien de plus que l'entrave de l'obéissance. Elle permet de contrôler mes subordonnés, mais ne suffit pas à me contrôler, moi. »
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: « La foi n'est rien de plus que l'entrave de l'obéissance. Elle permet de contrôler mes subordonnés, mais ne suffit pas à me contrôler, moi. »

languages.text: "İnanç, itaat için kullanılan bir zincirdir. Astlarımı kontrol etmeme yarar ancak beni kontrol edecek kadar güçlü değildir."
languages.original_text: "Faith is just the shackles of obedience. It is good for controlling my subordinates, but not good enough to control me."

traits.locale_text: "İnanç, itaat için kullanılan bir zincirdir yalnızca. Astlarımı kontrol etmek konusunda faydalıdır ancak beni kontrol edecek kadar güçlü değildir."
